r.s: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions
r.d: Object-oriented interface to the session_* family functions. It provides extra features such as database storage for session data using the DB, MDB and MDB2 package. It introduces new methods like isNew(), useCookies(), setExpire(), setIdle(), isExpired(), isIdled() and others.
r.n: - fixed bug #1016 - fixed bug #1077 - fixed bug #1358 - fixed bug #2834 - added methods useTransSID(), setGcMaxLifetime(), setGcProbability() - added container for MDB and MDB2 (thanks to Lorenzo Alberton) - added example for container usage
